      • updateInfoPanel

        public void updateInfoPanel(java.lang.String time,
                            java.lang.String timePB,
                            java.lang.String moves,
                            java.lang.String movesPB,
                            int deciseconds,
                            int seconds,
                            int minutes,
                            int hours,
                            int moveCount,
                            boolean gameStart)
        Updates the cube info from the cube.
        Parameters:
        time - The current time of the solve.
        timePB - The best solve time.
        moves - The current amount of moves of the solve.
        movesPB - The lowest amount of moves used to solve the cube.
        deciseconds - The current deciseconds of the cubes solve.
        seconds - The current seconds of the cubes solve.
        minutes - The current minutes of the cubes solve.
        hours - The current hours of the cubes solve.
        moveCount - The current amount of moves of the cubes solve.
        gameStart - Whether or not the solve has been started.

      • isGameStart

        Returns:
